Reinforced knowledge of how computers work internally

content.name: Firebase

Cost-effective for apps with low to medium traffic
Provides real-time database capabilities and authentication

content.name: Docker
content.description: Regularly used by Théo to streamline development and deployment workflows.
achievements: Containerized frontend and backend services efficiently
Simplified environment replication and consistency
Useful for multi-machine and production-ready setups
